  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40d0158d-3b98-4081-20a3-dedf5c8e69df#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Giotto: Kánai mennyegző és Krisztus siratása</string>
            <string language="en">Giotto: Wedding in Cana and mourning of Christ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Giotto: Hochzeit in Cana und im Beklagen 
von Christ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Giotto : Mariage dans Cana et le deuil du 
Christ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Giotto: Casamento em Cana e em mourning de 
Christ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giotto: Nozze in Cana e nel dolore di 
Christ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Giotto: Γάμος σε Cana και πένθος Χριστού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Giotto: Boda en Cana y el luto de Cristo</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Giotto: Kánai mennyegző és Krisztus siratása, 1304-1305 k. Padova, Scrovegni-kápolna, freskó.</string>
            <string language="en">Giotto: Wedding in Cana and mourning of Christ, about 1304-1305  Padova, Scrovegni-chapel, fresco.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">freskóciklus,  Padova,  Scrovegni-kápolna,  </string>
            <string language="en">Frescocycle,  Padova,  Scrovegni-chapel,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Giotto: Hochzeit in Cana und im Beklagen 
von Christ, ungefähr 1304-1305 Padova, Scrovegni-Kapelle, Fresko.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Giotto : Mariage dans Cana et le deuil du 
Christ, environ 1304-1305 Padova, Scrovegni-chapelle, fresque.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Giotto: Casamento em Cana e em mourning de 
Christ, aproximadamente 1304-1305 Padova, Scrovegni-scrovegni-chapel, 
fresco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giotto: Nozze in Cana e nel dolore di 
Christ, circa 1304-1305 Padova, Scrovegni-scrovegni-chapel, fresco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Giotto: Γάμος σε Cana και πένθος Χριστού, 
περίπου 1304-1305 Πάδοβα, σθροβεγνη-παρεκκλησι, νωπογραφία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Giotto: Boda en Cana y el luto de Cristo, 
cerca de 1304-1305 Padova, Scrovegni-capilla, fresco.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frescocycle, Padova, Scrovegni-Kapelle,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Frescocycle, Padova, Scrovegni-chapelle,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Frescocycle, Padova, Scrovegni-Scrovegni-chapel,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Frescocycle, Padova, Scrovegni-Scrovegni-chapel,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Frescocycle, Πάδοβα, σθροβεγνη-παρεκκλησι,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Frescocycle, Padova, Scrovegni-capilla,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
